devdoc.details: This contract represents a carbon credit market where users can buy and sell carbon credits with enhanced security.

buy(uint256,address,uint256).details: Allows a buyer to purchase carbon credits from a project.

params._excAmount: The amount of carbon credits to purchase.
params.companyAddress: The address of the company selling the carbon credits.
params.projectId: The ID of the project from which to purchase the carbon credits.

calculatePriceImpact(uint256,uint256,boo.details: Calculate price impact for a potential trade

checkSufficientStake(uint256,uint256).details: Check whether or not a company has provided enough Ether to stake for a project (for penalty purposes).

params._excAmount: The amount of exc they wish to sell from the project.

getCurrentPrice(uint256).details: Get current price for a project

getProjectPricingInfo(uint256).details: Get comprehensive pricing information for a project

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Get the admin role that controls a role

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grant a role to an account

hasRole(bytes32,address).details: Check if an account has a specific role

initializeProjectPricing(uint256,uint8,u.details: Initialize pricing for a new project (admin only)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Renounce a role (caller renounces their own role)

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revoke a role from an account

sell(uint256,uint256).details: Allows a seller to list and sell EcoXChange tokens (EXC) for a specific project.

params._excAmount: The amount of EXC to be sold.
params.projectId: The ID of the project for which the EXC is being sold. The seller must have enough EXC listed for the project and sufficient EXC balance to sell. If the project is completed, the EXC is transferred to the market and the seller receives ether. If the project is ongoing, the seller must stake 130% of the EXC amount in ether. The seller's ether is transferred to the contract for staking, with 30% being a penalty. The EXC is listed and the project is added to the seller's list of projects. Emits a `ReturnCredits` event with the seller's address and the amount of EXC sold.

validateProject(address,uint256,bool,uin.details: Validate a project by a validator, and handle penalty if project is invalid, otherwise transfer EXC to buyers.

params.actualEXC: The actual EXC (EcoXChange Token) amount for the project.
params.isValid: A boolean indicating whether the project is valid or not.

withdrawEther(address,uint256).details: Allows the contract owner to withdraw a specified amount of Ether from the contract balance and transfer it to a specified company address.Throws an error if the specified amount is greater than the contract balance.

params.amount: The amount of Ether to be withdrawn and transferred.
params.companyAddress: The address of the company to which the Ether will be transferred.

devdoc.title: EcoXChangeMarket

validateProject(address,uint256,bool,uin.notice: This function can only be called by a validator.

withdrawEther(address,uint256).notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.
